import React, {useState,useEffect} from "react"; import Axios from 'axios'; //image import logo from 'static/images/cds logo-02.svg' // components import Sidebar from "components/Sidebar/Sidebar.js"; //table import CardSettings from "components/Mentor/CardSettings.js"; // Susmita __ Taar-kata export default function Editmentor(props) { const url = 'http://localhost:5000/addmentor' const [addmentor, setAddmentor] = useState(null); const [data, setData] = useState({ email : "", fullname :"" , mobile : "", address: "", city : "", country : "", pincode : "", designation:"", linkedin:"", facebook:"", twitter : "", mentorpicture:"" }); useEffect(() => { Axios.get(url) .then(res=>{ setAddmentor(res => { setAddmentor(res.data) }).catch(err=>(console.log(err))) }) }, [] ) // function remove(id){ // console.log(id) // Axios.delete(url+id) // .then(res =>{ // console.log(res.data) // const myalldata = MentorList.filter(item => item.id !== id) // setAddmentor(myalldata) // }).catch(console.log(err)) // } function submit(e){ e.preventDefault() Axios.post(url,data) .then(res =>{ console.log(res.data) const mydata = [...MentorList, res.data] setAddmentor(mydata) }).catch(console.log(err)) } function handle(e){ const newdata ={...data} newdata[e.target.id] = e.target.value setData(newdata) } return ( <>
